wikipedia_page.main: Dr Andrew Rodger Waterston FRSE FRES (born Ollaberry, 30 March 1912, died Edinburgh, 12 July 1996) was a Scottish zoologist, specialising in malacology and entomology. He was interested in the insect fauna of the Middle East and in the fauna of the Outer Hebrides. He was generally known as Rodger Waterston.
